mapper.update: update company, ( select * from qyxx_tag where tag != '外滩线下理财企业' and EXISTS ( select 1 FROM (select company_name , count(*) from qyxx_tag group by company_name HAVING count(*)=1) as t1 where 1=1 and t1.company_name = qyxx_tag.company_name ) )as t2 set company.company_type=(CASE WHEN t2.tag = '外滩网络借贷' THEN 30 WHEN t2.tag = '外滩众筹' THEN 31 WHEN t2.tag = '外滩网银' THEN 32 WHEN t2.tag = '外滩支付' THEN 33 WHEN t2.tag = '外滩预付卡' THEN 34 WHEN t2.tag = '外滩融资租赁' THEN 35 ELSE 4 end ) ,company.update_date= now() where company.company_type=4 and t2.company_name=company.`name`
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM company_tag WHERE EXISTS (select 1 from qyxx_tag where company_name=company_tag.company_name)
mapper.select: SELECT company_name AS companyName, tag AS tagDesc, dt FROM `qyxx_tag` ORDER BY kid LIMIT #{pagination.begin}, #{pagination.pageSize}
select IFNULL(max(dt),0) AS dt FROM company_tag
select count(DISTINCT company_name) as counts from qyxx_tag where tag = '外滩线下理财企业' AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from company where `name`=qyxx_tag.company_name)

select DISTINCT company_name as `name`, 4 as companyType from qyxx_tag where tag = '外滩线下理财企业' AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from company where `name`=qyxx_tag.company_name) ORDER BY bbd_qyxx_id LIMIT #{pagination.begin}, #{pagination.pageSize}

select count(DISTINCT company_name) as counts from qyxx_tag where tag != '外滩线下理财企业' and EXISTS ( select 1 FROM (select company_name , count(*) from qyxx_tag group by company_name HAVING count(*)=1) as t1 where 1=1 and t1.company_name = qyxx_tag.company_name ) AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from company where `name`=qyxx_tag.company_name)

select DISTINCT company_name as `name`, ( CASE WHEN tag = '外滩网络借贷' THEN 30 WHEN tag = '外滩众筹' THEN 31 WHEN tag = '外滩网银' THEN 32 WHEN tag = '外滩支付' THEN 33 WHEN tag = '外滩预付卡' THEN 34 WHEN tag = '外滩融资租赁' THEN 35 ELSE -1 end ) AS companyType from qyxx_tag where tag != '外滩线下理财企业' and EXISTS ( select 1 FROM (select company_name , count(*) from qyxx_tag group by company_name HAVING count(*)=1) as t1 where 1=1 and t1.company_name = qyxx_tag.company_name ) AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from company where `name`=qyxx_tag.company_name) ORDER BY bbd_qyxx_id LIMIT #{pagination.begin}, #{pagination.pageSize}
